<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Containers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns an array with subarrays contains class names and also names of connected items of all the vehicle's cargo weapons in [[weaponsItems]] format. If weapon has no magazine, an empty array [] is returned instead of magazine info. If the argument is a vehicle with weapons, vehicles cargo is searched, unlike with [[weaponsItems]] command, which will return vehicle's weapons instead. 
* Since Arma 3 v1.95.145811 the returned array always contains secondary muzzle magazine info and consistent with [[getUnitLoadout]] format for weapon items.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[weaponsItemsCargo]] vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - see [[weaponsItems]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[weaponsItemsCargo]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[weaponsItemsCargo]] _weaponholder;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[weaponsItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[handgunItems]], [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[addHandgunItem]], [[primaryWeapon]], [[secondaryWeapon]], [[handgunWeapon]], [[weaponAccessories]], [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargoGlobal]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
